oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Superintegrable Cases of Four Dimensional Dynamical Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Esen, Oğul
Choudhury, Anindya Ghose
Guha, Partha
Gümral, Hasan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Dynamical Systems
34C14, 34C20
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Degenerate tri-Hamiltonian structures of Shivamoggi and generalized Raychaudhuri equations are exhibited. For certain specific values of the parameters, it is shown that hyperchaotic L\"{u} and Qi systems are superintegrable and admit tri-Hamiltonian structures.
Comment: Comments and suggestions are welcome
